A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
As a movie\, it was very good. Beautifully shot\, great acting\, top notch visual affects\, and a terrific soundtrack. The movie is "enjoyable." 

The reason for my low score is because I did not "like" the movie. As a fan of the original trilogy I actually feel slighted. No spoilers in this review\, and do not take my review too close to heart. I have been dedicated fan since I saw the first movie\, Episode IV\, as a child. I've played nearly every game\, read every book\, all the comics\, every show\, and STILL have my full\, original\, Hasbro collection (minus the Princess in her wedding gown...never found that one).

My fanatic dedication is over now\, and I will watch the next movie\, once it releases to DVD. I have some Black series figures for sale\, now\, since I will no longer collect them.
